title: Serene Silvassa Escape near Daman Ganga River with Daily Breakfast & One Lunch
description:
An oasis of peace, serenity and tranquillity - Treat Resort Silvassa is the ultimate destination for people living in Mumbai and Gujarat, looking for a quick weekend escape from the city. Located five hours from Mumbai, four hours from Surat, and eight hours from Ahmedabad, this resort is near the beautiful Daman Ganga River. Unwind in seclusion amid 24 acres of lush greenery, where the infinity pool calls for sun-kissed afternoon swims and the handcrafted chef fare promises to tantalise the senses. Bliss is at your fingertips with the onsite Wellness Spa, while the disco, waterpark and kids' play area promise to keep little ones entertained for hours.

As the winner of the Tripadvisor Traveller's Choice Award 2022, Treat Resort Silvassa is also highly regarded for its ideal location. The town's beaches, gardens, and cultural hotspots are all nearby. It's time to relax, surrounded by nature.
